short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension uses readability.js to parse out the 'cruft' leaving you with simply the article to read.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension simply parses web pages cutting out ads and unnecessary distractions leaving you with what you want: the content.
